email_chain.subject: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

I hope this email finds you well.

We have a vessel available for your coal shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao. Details are as follows:

- Commodity: Coal
- Quantity: 75,000 MT
- Incoterm: CIF
- Vessel: PACIFIC STAR
- Freight Quote: USD 22 per MT
- Laycan: 25-30 September 2023

Please let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Liam Carter
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for the offer. USD 22 per MT seems a bit high given the current market. Can you revise the rate to USD 20 per MT? Also, could you provide more details on the vessel's DWT and LOA?

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez
Global Cargo

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for your response. I can adjust the rate to USD 21 per MT. The PACIFIC STAR has a DWT of 180,000 and an LOA of 290m. The demurrage rate is USD 10,000 per day, pro rata.

Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

USD 21 per MT is acceptable. However, the demurrage rate is still on the higher side. Can we negotiate this to USD 9,000 per day?

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

I can agree to a demurrage rate of USD 9,500 per day. Let me know if this is acceptable, and I will proceed with the booking.

Best regards,
Liam

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Offer: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

USD 9,500 per day is acceptable. Please proceed with the booking and send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Sophia

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for PACIFIC STAR
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Great! I have attached the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Liam
